name: black-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Decreases the wild Pokémon encounter rate by 50%.
short_effect: Halves the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A black flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon less likely to appear.
flavor_text.platinum: A black flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon less likely to appear.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A black flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokémon less likely to appear.
